// src/components/HomeImage.jsx
import React,{useEffect}from'react';import'./home.css';import profileAnimated from'../../assets/profile1.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HomeImage=()=>{useEffect(()=>{const eyes=[{eye:document.getElementById('eye1'),pupil:document.getElementById('pupil1')},{eye:document.getElementById('eye2'),pupil:document.getElementById('pupil2')}];const handleMouseMove=e=>{eyes.forEach(_ref=>{let{eye,pupil}=_ref;const rect=eye.getBoundingClientRect();const centerX=rect.left+rect.width/2;const centerY=rect.top+rect.height/2;const dx=e.clientX-centerX;const dy=e.clientY-centerY;const angle=Math.atan2(dy,dx);const radius=3;const x=radius*Math.cos(angle);const y=radius*Math.sin(angle);pupil.style.transform=`translate(${x}px, ${y}px)`;});};const blinkEyes=()=>{eyes.forEach(_ref2=>{let{eye}=_ref2;return eye.classList.add('blink');});setTimeout(()=>{eyes.forEach(_ref3=>{let{eye}=_ref3;return eye.classList.remove('blink');});},200);};document.addEventListener('mousemove',handleMouseMove);const interval=setInterval(()=>{if(Math.random()<0.7)blinkEyes();},3000);return()=>{document.removeEventListener('mousemove',handleMouseMove);clearInterval(interval);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home__img",style:{backgroundImage:`url(${profileAnimated})`},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"eye",id:"eye1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pupil",id:"pupil1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"eyelid"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"eye",id:"eye2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pupil",id:"pupil2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"eyelid"})]})]});};export default HomeImage;
